verbs.description: U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis [V: has] raised the prospect of additional American steps against China if its " militarization " of the South China Sea keeps apace . He said Beijing was intimidating and coercing others in the region by putting weapons systems on manmade islands . His remarks were backed by President Donald Trump , who said on Twitter : " Very surprised that China would be doing this ? "

His remarks were backed by President Donald Trump , who said on Twitter : " Very surprised that China would be doing this ? "
